bug.author: theSundayProgrammer
bug.description: Method: RSModel::BuildModel Error: .\src\mlpack\methods\range_search\rs_model.cpp(72): error C2899: typename can not be used outside a template declaration The fix, I think, would be to remove said keyword

comments.comment: Hi there, I don't have a setup to reproduce this. If you'd like this fixed, could you please test that fix and provide a pull request? Once you do that, I can test the fix on Linux (with gcc and clang) and then we can merge it in. Thanks!

I have implemented it and put it in my own fork <denchmark-link:https://github.com/theSundayProgrammer/mlpack.git>https://github.com/theSundayProgrammer/mlpack.git</denchmark-link> and it works. The change is simple: just remove the keyword 'typename' from rs_model.cpp.

Yep, I merged in your commit. Thanks! Do you mind if I add your name/email to the list of contributors? Also, it looks like your git configuration is a little off; your commits have the email '<denchmark-link:mailto:joe.mariadassou@gmail.cvom>joe.mariadassou@gmail.cvom</denchmark-link> ' (I amended this in each of the commits I cherry-picked from your fork to be 'gmail.com').

I will honoured to be in the list of contributors. II am not sure why github uses the wrong email address. My Profile is correct. On Wed, Nov 25, 2015 at 3:41 AM, Ryan Curtin <denchmark-link:mailto:notifications@github.com>notifications@github.com</denchmark-link>
wrote:
Closed #483 #483. â€” Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub #483 (comment).
<denchmark-h:h2></denchmark-h>
Joseph Chakravarti Mariadassou <denchmark-link:http://thesundayprogrammer.com>http://thesundayprogrammer.com</denchmark-link>

Sure, added in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/commit/4f97fdfb7e158025283c2652084af670bc6e2d76>4f97fdf</denchmark-link> . Your Github profile is just fine -- I think the issue is with your git configuration on the system you are using to develop.
